SELECT t.id AS track_id, t.title AS track_title, t.file_path, t.duration AS duration_seconds, t.track_num AS track_number, a.id AS album_id, a.title AS album_title, a.artist, a.cover_url AS cover_path, a.category FROM tracks t JOIN albums a ON t.album_id = a.id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?

SELECT id as userID, name, username, password, role, avatar, email, email_verified as emailVerified, created_at as registrationDate FROM users WHERE username = ? LIMIT ?
INSERT INTO user_logins (user_id, login_time, ip_address, device_info, login_status, failure_reason) VALUES (?, NOW(), ?, ?, ?, ?)
